EmailTemplate.name: 2018BK-17 KI 300/KA 310 Buyer’s Guide EXTERNAL.2018BK-17 KI 300/KA 310 Buyer’s G
EmailTemplate.subject: 2018 BendixKing Sales Bulletin Updates and Discounts
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
Sales Bulletin | October 2018
Thank you for being a valued customer. Here is this week's Sales Bulletin.
Dealer Sales Bulletin
BendixKing announces a $500 promotion on the KI 300 and KA 310 bundle. The KI 300 is TSO'd and available now and the KA 310 in early Q1 2019. More information on this promotion can be found in Dealer Sales Bulletin 2018BK-17.
The complete list of 2018 sales bulletins is available at myaerospace/parts & repairs/downloads/sales bulletins <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/parts-and-repairs/downloads/sales-bulletins#sort=%40fdisplayname2077%20descending]]>. Dealers must log in to view these bulletins.
Find your nearest BendixKing Area Sales Manager by visiting our website: https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team]]>.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/BK_Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for BendixKing email communications.
